scenes.description: Performance of the song 'JUDGEMENT -審判- (Full Spec Edition)'.
Instrumental transition scene showing a rocky island in the water.

subtitles.original: ・・・レールからはずれた 不良品の野良犬さ だけど簡単には 手綱は振らせないぜ
subtitles.english: ...A stray dog of a defective product off the rails, but I won't let you hold the reins so easily.

subtitles.original: 大人－イエスマンに－成りそびれた
subtitles.english: I failed to become an adult—a "yes-man".

subtitles.original: Whoa, we are bad boys
subtitles.english: Whoa, we are bad boys

subtitles.original: 若者―ワルに―残された「No」という名のJustice
subtitles.english: Justice called "No" left to the youth—the delinquents.

subtitles.original: Now, Breakin' the law Breakin' the world 壊せ
subtitles.english: Now, Breakin' the law Breakin' the world, break it!

subtitles.original: Breakin' the world 壊せ 切り裂けTenderness
subtitles.english: Breakin' the world, break it! Slice it up, tenderness.

subtitles.original: Now, Breakin' the rule 六法全書じゃ縛れない
subtitles.english: Now, Breakin' the rule, you can't bind me with the Statute Books.

subtitles.original: 反乱分子さ
subtitles.english: I'm a rebel.

subtitles.original: 振り上げた 握り拳が 俺たちのJUDGEMENT
subtitles.english: Our raised fists are our JUDGEMENT.

subtitles.original: 愛さえも知らない 不良品の野良犬さ
subtitles.english: A stray dog of a defective product that doesn't even know love.

subtitles.original: だけど地位や金じゃ 餌付けはできないぜ
subtitles.english: But you can't tame me with status or money.

subtitles.original: ・・・傷ついて 傷ついて 全て失っちまっても
subtitles.english: ...Even if I get hurt, get hurt, and lose everything.

subtitles.original: 染まっちゃならねえ それこそがJUSTICE・・・
subtitles.english: I must not be tainted, that is exactly what JUSTICE is...

subtitles.original: JUSTICE!
subtitles.english: JUSTICE!

subtitles.original: Now, Breakin' the law Breakin' the world 壊せ
subtitles.english: Now, Breakin' the law Breakin' the world, break it!

subtitles.original: Breakin' the world 壊せ 切り裂けTenderness
subtitles.english: Breakin' the world, break it! Slice it up, tenderness.

subtitles.original: Now, Breakin' the rule お偉いさんにゃ従わない
subtitles.english: Now, Breakin' the rule, I won't obey the big shots.

subtitles.original: 反乱分子さ
subtitles.english: I'm a rebel.

subtitles.original: 振り上げろ 握り拳を
subtitles.english: Raise your fists.

subtitles.original: 俺たちは・・・ そうさ俺たちが
subtitles.english: We are... That's right, we are

subtitles.original: JUDGEMENT・・・
subtitles.english: JUDGEMENT...

subtitles.original: JUDGEMENT・・・
subtitles.english: JUDGEMENT...

subtitles.original: チート ギフテッド 俺様がボン 禁忌 禁忌 呆気なく昇天
subtitles.english: Cheat, gifted, I'm the one who's born, taboo, taboo, easily astounding

subtitles.original: 反則 異端 異様なもんではないです 弁解 それ聞いてないって
subtitles.english: Foul play, heresy, it's nothing unusual, excuse? I didn't hear that

subtitles.original: Aye, ライバル 口を揃えて Wow, ライバル 口を揃えて
subtitles.english: Aye, rivals, all exterminated, wow, rivals, all exterminated

subtitles.original: バグで マグで 認めたぜって マジで これを待て 全部ナマ身で
subtitles.english: By a bug, by luck, I've admitted it, seriously, wait for this, all in the flesh

subtitles.original: Bling-Bang-Bang, Bling-Bang-Bang, Bling-Bang-Bang-Born
subtitles.english: Bling-Bang-Bang, Bling-Bang-Bang, Bling-Bang-Bang-Born

subtitles.original: 強く弾き切る前に 相手の方がバテてで暗いし I got a good hurdle very happy
subtitles.english: Before I can strongly repel them, the opponent is already exhausted, I got a good hurdle very happy

subtitles.original: Bling, Bang, Bang
subtitles.english: Bling, Bang, Bang

subtitles.original: お前の期待より愛せ 俺バットにできない ことばかり 抱けるベリーハッピー
subtitles.english: Love me more than your expectations, I can't do things easily, but I'm very happy

subtitles.original: 呆れてる 呆れてる 周り脱ぐまで 全部家族 友達 もう反則的だ チームに俺に任せろバイビー
subtitles.english: Shocked, shocked, until the surroundings are stripped, all family and friends, it's illegal, leave it to the team and me, bye-bye

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡 答えちゃって Who's the best? I'm the best! Oh yeah yeah yeah yeah
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror on the wall, answer me, who's the best? I'm the best! Oh yeah yeah yeah yeah

subtitles.original: 生身のまま行けるところまで To the next, to the 1番上
subtitles.english: As I am, as far as I can go, to the next, to the top

subtitles.original: Bling-Bang-Bang-Born... To the next, to the 1番上
subtitles.english: Bling-Bang-Bang-Born... To the next, to the top

subtitles.original: Ey-day 俺のままでいるだけで超フレックス Ey-day 誰も口を挟めない
subtitles.english: Ey-day, just being myself is a super flex, ey-day, nobody can interrupt
